description: This file defines a 'Modal' React component used for displaying modal dialogs with optional footer content. It manages opening and closing behavior, including handling Escape key presses and clicking outside the modal content.

methods.name: Modal({ open, title, children, onClose, footer })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a modal dialog, managing open/close state and user interactions.

ctags.name: Modal
ctags.pattern: /^export function Modal({ open, title, children, onClose, footer }) {$/
